history.proof: intros l H. induction H. - apply nil_is_pwd. - hauto lq: on use: divides_antisym, gauss, divides_refl, cons_is_wf, Nat.mul_1_r, rel_prime_wf, one_min_div, cons_is_pwd unfold: is_prime.

original: intros l H. induction H. - apply nil_is_pwd. - apply cons_is_pwd. + apply IHcons_is_pwd. + intros n0 Hin. apply H0. apply in_inv with (a:= (p, n))(l:= tail). apply Hin.
